es.uam.eps.bmi.search.indexing

Class IndexWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.bmi.search.indexing.IndexWriter

  • public class IndexWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    IndexWriter class. Main builder for indexes, adds documents to the index writing to disc when needed to avoid RAM overload. It also merges every subindex built in the process to the final index.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String docName,
                java.lang.String content)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Adds document passed to the index.
        Assumes that every term in content is separated by spaces.
        Parameters:
        docName - name of the document.
        content - string with content of document.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String docName,
                java.lang.String[] content)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Adds document passed to the index.
        Parameters:
        docName - name of the document.
        content - tokens to add literally to the document
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Finishes the creation of the index. This method must be called after last document is added so the index can be closed and every temp file merged correctly.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
